properties.entry: SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, CREATE_DATE, FILE_PATH || CHANGE_NAME AS TITLEIMG FROM BOARD B JOIN ATTACHMENT ON(BOARD_NO = REF_BNO) WHERE BOARD_TYPE = 3 AND B.STATUS = 'Y' AND FILE_LEVEL = 1 ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC
INSERT INTO BOARD(BOARD_NO, BOARD_TYPE, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, REF_UNO ) VALUES (SEQ_BNO.NEXTVAL, 3, ? ,? ,? )
INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT(FILE_NO, REF_BNO, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, FILE_PATH, FILE_LEVEL) VALUES (SEQ_FNO.NEXTVAL, SEQ_BNO.CURRVAL, ?,?,?,?)
SELECT FILE_NO, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, FILE_PATH, NVL(FILE_LEVEL, 0) AS FILE_LEVEL FROM ATTACHMENT ORDER BY UPLOAD_DATE
